title: Absinthe 2.0.4 Windows
description:
Support:

iPad 1, iPad 2, iPad 3 (iPad2,4 is now supported as of Absinthe 2.0.4)
 
iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S
 
iPod touch 3rd generation, iPod touch 4th generation



How To:

1. Make a backup of your device in iTunes by right clicking on your device name under the Ã¢â‚¬ËœDevicesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ menu and click Ã¢â‚¬ËœBack UpÃ¢â‚¬â„¢.
